item.title: Sublime Merge Themes
item.description: How to use themes in sublime merge Some Sublime Merge Themes： dracula modified meetio How to generally, a sublime merge theme contains: theme file {THEME}.sublime-theme color scheme files {THEME}.sublime-color-scheme Commit Message - {THEME}.sublime-settings Diff - {THEME}.sublime-settings File Mode - {THEME}.sublime-settings Widget - {THEME}.sublime-settings copy those files to： {SUBLIME_MERGE_HOME}/Data/Packages/User
